column5: Born May 10, 2008 (couldn't wait 12 more hours till mothers day).  Maverick Landon Harris
Congrats Mike!  Hope everyone is happy and healthy.  Don't worry, you'll get to have good night sleeps in about 2 or so years....LOL.
Congrats Mike.. and what Cliff said ! lol
I've got a two year old at home already...so its more like four years no sleep
Details details....haha.  Congrats again...no better feeling than holding your newborn child.
Congrats he is beautiful.  I have a 25, 23,21 & 19 yr old None live at home now and i still have sleepless nights.....lol
Congrats and his name is great too Hes a top gun baby

Hey Mav, Welcome to the team!!... PS since I figure you can outfish you're dad... I will add you to the tourney when it is my next turn up... you cool with that? Beginners luck and all is in our favour!!  Congrats to you and the Mrs. definatly a keeper and cute to boot... judging by you're dad's ugly mug he has the look of his mother LOL!!   Congrats guys!  PS... The Bassinet is for the baby not you're manbag..  G
Congrats to you and your wife  Rob
Welcome aboard Maverick....congrats Mike to you and your wife  Cheers  Craig
Congratulations on your new member. You have lots of work and fun ahead of you. My wife and I just started over again with our first grand daughter this year. Already got her a fishing rod.
Congrats I love those new kid additions had a blast with my 6 month old nephew today.
